sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		Code as string,
		Active as string,
		TimeZoneCode as string,
		Name as string,
		CurrencyCode as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
